en.purpose: To assess and interpret histological and immunohistochemical diagnostic patterns in order to classify hepatocellular adenoma subtype and estimate the associated risk of malignant transformation.
en.misuse: Not to be used for staging or treatment planning of hepatocellular carcinoma.

other_details.references:
Regionala cancercentrum i samverkan. Nationellt vårdprogram levercellscancer: Kapitel 9 Kategorisering av tumören. Kunskapsbanken, 2024. Available at: https://kunskapsbanken.cancercentrum.se/diagnoser/levercellscancer/vardprogram/kategorisering-av-tumoren/

other_details.en: A structured diagnostic assessment used to interpret histological and immunohistochemical patterns in hepatocellular adenoma and to support subtype classification and risk evaluation.
